Description: Implement features to import grocery lists from various sources
Build core engine to compare prices across stores and normalize units
Create adapters for each supported grocery store
Implement user authentication and list management
Develop central product catalog with matching algorithms
Create CSV parser with column mapping for flexible imports
Implement line-by-line text import with regex parsing for quantities and units
Add support for importing from Google Sheets via URL
Build system to convert between units (g/kg/ml/l/ea) and calculate per-unit prices
Implement algorithm to determine best store per item and optimal shopping split
Create adapter to fetch and parse Walmart.ca product data using ScrapingBee
Create adapter to fetch and parse No Frills product data using ScrapingBee
Create adapter to fetch and parse Food Basics product data using ScrapingBee
Create adapter to fetch and parse Costco.ca product data using ScrapingBee
Implement email magic link authentication flow with Supabase
Create API endpoints for list operations with proper RLS policies
Develop fuzzy matching algorithm to link store products to canonical products
Implement time-series storage for price history with latest price view
